channel.title: Drygore 317 PVM/Bossing/PK server!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AJcUNru.png[/img]
[url=http://drygore.org]http://drygore.org[/url]
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HNmerVI.png[/img] Drygore is a new released 317 RSPS, our intention is to provide enjoyment and we want to make our players feel rewarded when receiving certain items. Our server is based around the Economy. We have enhanced PVM along with custom bosses for our players, PKing works perfectly along with a fantastic PK shop and we also support Skilling to make gold for anybody that enjoys that aspect of the game, we are a 24/7 running and have all the essentials such as Forums, Auto Vote, Auto Donate and a ticket support system.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/j7SSqqg.png[/img] We have many features for you to enjoy and play with on Drygore and guarantee that you will not be bored... That is if you are interested in a RSPS. We have many bosses to fight from including custom bosses, the following bosses we have are; -Nex -King Black Dragon -Dagannoth Kings -Tormented Demons -Corporal Beast -God wars -Forgotten warriors -Mad mummy -Barrelchest -Forgotten warrior -War zone (MASSIVE PLAYER V NPC WAR) !DANGEROUS!
We also have many minigames to choose from such as; -Assualt -Dominion Tower -Fight caves -Pest control -Barrows -Warriors Guild -Duel arena -Nomad -Fist of Guthix -Castle wars
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3l9nKKf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kFQqhCq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IABJxbu.png[/img] Not enough for you? Make sure to head ingame and checkout all of our ingame assets!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0wyEEHE.png[/img] On Drygore Skilling is a asset to the server and is not left forgotten. We have updated zones for you to explore when leveling each skill, you can also make your GP from most skills. All of the skills that work (every single one);
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PFPLL2n.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BcFQlZq.png[/img] We have made sure that our site is perfect and clean for our users. We also have many features on our site to help with anything.
Forums [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7fDkD8E.png[/img]
24/7 Ticket support [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/P3zxMVr.png[/img]
Other features; -Auto vote -Webclient -Gold guides -Client -Auto Donate
Tryout Drygore today! -Not all features were listed in the thread but have gave a overview of the server More information may be posted! [URL=http://drygore.org]http://drygore.org[/URL]

item.title: Drygore 317 PVM/Bossing/PK server!
item.dc:creator: @deltarsps deltarsps
item.description:
@deltarsps wrote:

http://drygore.org

[center]
Drygore is a new released 317 RSPS, our intention is to provide enjoyment and we want to make our players feel rewarded when receiving certain items. Our server is based around the Economy. We have enhanced PVM along with custom bosses for our players, PKing works perfectly along with a fantastic PK shop and we also support Skilling to make gold for anybody that enjoys that aspect of the game, we are a 24/7 running and have all the essentials such as Forums, Auto Vote, Auto Donate and a ticket support system.


We have many features for you to enjoy and play with on Drygore and guarantee that you will not be boredâ€¦ That is if you are interested in a RSPS. We have many bosses to fight from including custom bosses, the following bosses we have are;
-Nex
-King Black Dragon

-Tormented Demons
-Corporal Beast
-God wars
-Forgotten warriors
-Mad mummy

-War zone (MASSIVE PLAYER V NPC WAR) !DANGEROUS!

We also have many minigames to choose from such as;

-Pest control
-Barrows
-Warriors Guild
-Duel arena
-Nomad
-Fist of Guthix
-Castle wars




Not enough for you? Make sure to head ingame and checkout all of our ingame assets!


On Drygore Skilling is a asset to the server and is not left forgotten. We have updated zones for you to explore when leveling each skill, you can also make your GP from most skills.
All of the skills that work (every single one);


We have made sure that our site is perfect and clean for our users. We also have many features on our site to help with anything.

Forums

24/7 Ticket support

Other features;
-Auto vote
-Webclient
-Gold guides
-Client
-Auto Donate

Tryout Drygore today! -Not all features were listed in the thread but have gave a overview of the server
More information may be posted!
